Nice to meet you!

I’m Jusung, a junior UX/UI Designer based in Seoul. With a background rooted in designing digital products for web/mobile applications, I have a particular interest in web development to create the actual product. I want to be a designer who is sensitive to technology and design trends, and who can accept anything whenever necessary.

My Values,
and beliefs

  • Meticulous

    I'm sensitive to visuals and I like alignment. Sometimes I get excited by organizing the mess. I think details are important and I always try to achieve the best quality. There are disadvantages of excessive detail immersion, but I want to leverage efficient tools and quickly solve them.
